meanings.meaning: This indicates that a part of the EVAPcontrol system is no longer fuctioning correctly. The EVAP system consistsof many parts, including (but not limited to) the gas cap, fuel lines, carboncanister, purge valve, and other hoses. The (EVAP) emissioncontrol system prevents the escape of fuel vapors from a vehicle's fuel system.Fuel vapors are routed by hoses to a charcoal canister for storage. Later, when the engine is running a purge control valve opens allowing intake vacuum to siphon the fuel vapors into theengine.

causes.cause: The canister is plugged and not working properly
The gas cap is not installed or working properly

solutions.solution: Check and/or replace the purge valve
Have a professional use a smoke machine to detect leaks
Inspect for damaged or disconnected hoses around the Evap purge solenoid
Inspect the EVAP system for cuts/holes in tubes/hoses
Remove and reinstall the gas cap, clear the code, and drive for a day and see if the codes come back.

symptoms.symptom: You likely won't notice any drivability problems.
